title: Someone has been attempting to DDoS us for weeks and we do nothing
dot:
digraph DDoS_Attack_Response{rankdir=LR; node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue]; A[label="DDoS Attack
- Ongoing for weeks
- 800K download attempts in 5 days
- 6 million attempts in 30 days
- Primarily from EU (Germany, UK)"]; B[label="Response Strategy"]; C1[label="Do Nothing
- No IP blocking
- No 'Under Attack' mode activated
- Server CPU usage: 0-1%"]; C2[label="Why?"];C3[label="- Services can handle billions of requests
- Unlimited bandwidth with Cloudflare"]; C4[label="How?"];C5[label="- Minimal design for apps and backend
- Avoid third-party services
- Monolith architecture"]; D1[label="Monolith Advantages"];D2[label="- Simplified deployment
- Fewer dependencies
- Easier debugging"]; E1[label="Frameworks Used
- Golang: Echo, Gin
- PHP: Laravel
- Ruby: Rails
- Rust: Actix, Rocket, Warp"]; F1[label="Deployment Process"];F2[label="- No Docker/Kubernetes
- Use binaries for deployment
- Native execution for performance"]; G1[label="Update"];G2[label="- Vercel's new features
- Spend Management
- Attack Challenge Mode"]; A->B;B->C1;B->C2;B->C4;C2->C3;C4->D1;D1->E1;B->F1;F1->F2;B->G1;G1->G2;}

(Keep the cover outside)"];invert[label="Invert duvet cover over roll"];unroll[label="Unroll duvet into place
Cover fully on duvet"];start->arrange_duvet;arrange_duvet->roll;roll->invert;invert->unroll;end[label="Duvet is ready!"];unroll->end;edge[color=black, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];node[fillcolor="#E6F7FF"];label="Duvet Cover Changing Process
(Roll-Invert-Unroll Method)";labelloc=top;}

title: About the Tailscale.com outage on March 7, 2024
dot: digraph tls_outage{node[shape=box, style="filled", fontname="Arial", fontsize=10, fillcolor="#e0f7fa", fontcolor="#000000"];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10]; subgraph cluster_title{label="Tailscale TLS Certificate Expiry Outage - March 7, 2024";style=dotted;color="#00796b";}subgraph cluster_what_happened{label="What Happened";style=dotted;color="#004d40";node[fillcolor="#b2dfdb"];what_happened[label="Website refresh in Dec 2023\nHosting migration + IPv6 proxy misconfiguration"];probers_issue[label="Probers checked only IPv6\nMissed certificate expiry"];cert_expiry[label="TLS certificate expired on March 7, 2024"];}subgraph cluster_impact{label="The Impact";style=dotted;color="#004d40";node[fillcolor="#b2dfdb"];doc_unavailable[label="Documentation & blog unavailable"];console_unavailable[label="Admin console affected for some users"];install_unavailable[label="Install script unavailable"];packages_accessible[label="Packages for installation remained accessible"];}subgraph cluster_steps{label="Steps to Fix";style=dotted;color="#004d40";node[fillcolor="#b2dfdb"];fix_1[label="Temporarily removed AAAA records"];fix_2[label="Manually renewed certificates"];fix_3[label="Restored AAAA records"];fix_4[label="Plan to update probers (check IPv4/IPv6)"];fix_5[label="Future goal: Support IPv6 natively"];}what_happened->probers_issue->cert_expiry;cert_expiry->doc_unavailable;cert_expiry->console_unavailable;cert_expiry->install_unavailable;install_unavailable->packages_accessible; fix_1->fix_2->fix_3;fix_3->fix_4;fix_4->fix_5;doc_unavailable->fix_1[label="Fix: Remove AAAA"];console_unavailable->fix_2[label="Fix: Renew certificates"];install_unavailable->fix_2[label="Fix: Renew certificates"];}
